explains: adj. 负载的；装满的；苦恼的
v. 装载（lade 的过去分词）
n. （Laden）人名；（阿拉伯）拉丹；（德、罗）拉登；（法）拉当
wordGroup: osama bin laden 奥萨马·本·拉登

sentences.en: I came home laden with cardboard boxes.
sentences.cn: 我满载着纸箱子回了家。

sentences.en: When his boat was well-laden, the Mermaid would sink down into the sea, smiling at him.
sentences.cn: 当他的船满载时，美人鱼会沉到海里，对他微笑。

sentences.en: The trees were laden with apples.
